Uses of Interface
org.apache.mina.io.IoFilterChain

  • Packages that use IoFilterChain 
    Package Description
    org.apache.mina.io
    Low-level protocol implementation layer (I/O layer).
    org.apache.mina.io.datagram
    Datagram (UDP/IP) support.
    org.apache.mina.io.socket
    Socket (TCP/IP) support.

    • Uses of IoFilterChain in org.apache.mina.io

      Classes in org.apache.mina.io that implement IoFilterChain 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractIoFilterChain
      An abstract implementation of IoFilterChain that provides common operations for developers to support specific transport types.
      class  IoSessionFilterChain
      An IoFilterChain that forwards filterWrite requests to the specified IoSessionManagerFilterChain.
      class  IoSessionManagerFilterChain
      An IoFilterChain that forwards all events except filterWrite to the IoSessionFilterChain of the recipient session.
      Methods in org.apache.mina.io that return IoFilterChain 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IoFilterChain IoSessionManager.getFilterChain()
      Returns the filter chain that filters all events which is related with sessions this manager manages.
      IoFilterChain IoSession.getFilterChain()
      Returns the filter chain that only affects this session.

    • Uses of IoFilterChain in org.apache.mina.io.datagram

      Methods in org.apache.mina.io.datagram that return IoFilterChain 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IoFilterChain DatagramConnector.getFilterChain() 
      IoFilterChain DatagramAcceptor.getFilterChain() 

    • Uses of IoFilterChain in org.apache.mina.io.socket

      Methods in org.apache.mina.io.socket that return IoFilterChain 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IoFilterChain SocketConnector.getFilterChain() 
      IoFilterChain SocketAcceptor.getFilterChain()
